title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 901.2 - Procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 901.2 - Procedure

State Regulations
(a) Upon request
being made to the fund, either oral or written, applicant shall reduce such
request to writing on a form provided by the fund. A copy of such form is
attached to this regulation.[FN*]
(b) Upon approval by the fund of such
request, applicant shall be given access to the specific records requested, if
available, for inspection and copying at the fund's offices. (c) Fees for making copies for applicant are
established at 25 cents per page. [FN*] Form not filed with Secretary of

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
901.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
